Changelog
=========

1.3 - 2010-08-24
----------------

- Fixed bug with virtual hosting and quoted paths.
  [elro]

1.2 - 2010-08-16
----------------

- Restore zope.component site after subrequest.
  [elro]

1.1 - 2010-08-14
----------------

- Virtual hosting, relative url and error response support.
  [elro]

1.0 - 2010-07-28
----------------

- Initial release.
  [elro]
